body_html:
Sure thing. The tensor and Variable code path will both end up at https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c#L3500-L3592 at some point.

This place is likely not the problem, because this code is shared between Variable and tensor, but I haven't looked too much into this yet. One thing that could help in understanding the problem is to GDB and see where the error is happening.
